name: HallowQueen
description:
HallowQueen is a top-down shooter set in a world of skeletons, demons, and witches. You play as the lone protector of a caravan, on their way to defeat the evil Hallow Queen from destroying the world. Set out and test your skills as you try and defeat the Hallow Queen and her ghastly henchmen!

Controls:

WASD/ARROW KEYS - MOVE

SPACEBAR/OPTION/ALT - SHOOT/SELECT

CHANGING RESOLUTION IS UNDER OPTIONS
